about_the_game:
This demo will cover the first chapter of the game.

Storyline:
In 1750, right after Europe’s great plague came to an end, the catholic church saw a significant increase in cases of possession and unnatural phenomena. Thinking that this situation may grow out of proportion, a few Cardinals founded a secret organization called Ordo Lucis Templariorum, Order of the Light Templars, to investigate and solve all the unnatural cases.

On September 10th 2015, rumors of an unnatural event that had occurred a few days prior in a small village called Creekwell got to the ears of the Light Templars. They sent the young priest Edward Davies to investigate the deeds that took place in Creekwell Village.



Gameplay:
Investigate what happened in Creekwell Village and uncover the truth while defending yourself from the creatures inhabiting the land.

Search for objects to help you in your journey, and clues that will help you progress throughout the story.

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain inappropriate content for all ages like violence and gore.
